title: Responsive Design
content: Whether your customers generally visit your website from their personal mobile or work laptop makes a big difference to how your site displays. I can make sure your website looks, and functions, at any resolution.

title: Wireframes & Prototyping
content: I've got Figma all figured out. This world leading design tool allows me to create wireframes and and prototypes for your website so you can see how your ideas will function before investing in development.

title: Front-end Development
content: I specialise in building accessible, interactive and engaging websites using tools such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, NextJS and React.

title: User Research & Testing
content: Your users are the most important part of your business. I can help you engage with customers through surveys, interviews and workshops to ensure your website is built with them in mind.
